text: María Elizabeth León Herrera (Zapopan, February 14, 1986), is a Mexican singer, dancer, actress and composer, former vocalist of T' de Tila and Playa Limbo. In 2016, she made her acting debut participating in the Telemundo and Netflix series Guerra de Idols. She made her debut on Televisa's Popstars program, where she formed the group T' de Tila. Since then, she has participated in other competitions on the network, winning them.
title: María León (singer)
